name: HellSpheres
description:
In this game, you control a clot of energy that feeds on the energy of other balls, collecting and storing it in yourself, dodging red balls that take away your energy. Be careful and don't touch the walls!

Hell Spheres - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a spherical clot of energy, which must collect other spheres with energy and increase in size, increasing which the player becomes cramped within the level.

Control:
WASD - walking

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Unique Levels
- Difficulty
